document.full_text: georgian riot police used teargas, water cannon and rubber bullets on thursday to halt five days of demonstrations against president mikheil saakashvili, who blamed the unrest on russia.
document.title: georgian protest crushed as president blames russia
lines_and_colors: georgian riot police used teargas, water cannon and rubber bullets on thursday to halt five days of demonstrations against president mikheil saakashvili, who blamed the unrest on russia.
